short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to automate lead management

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easify CRM Ext automates lead management by streamlining the process of gathering and managing leads from Gmail and CRM platforms. With this extension, users can:

Automatically extract lead details from Gmail including Documents.
Seamlessly manage, store, and update leads within your CRM system.
Simplify lead tracking by integrating with your favorite CRM tool, CRMfinity, and Gmail, improving overall productivity and lead follow-ups.

Note:
You need a CRMFinity Account to be able to use it.
https://www.crmfinity.com/dev
